communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Court records show that Indira Maneiro filed an EEOC complaint while working for FEMA: https://www.courtlistener.com/docket/68106635/6/maneiro-v-mayorkas/

Therefore, I request the following records:

1) The aforementioned EEOC complaint filed by Indira Maneiro while working for FEMA.

2) The complete file of attached to the complaint filed by Indira Maneiro while working for FEMA.

3) Any communications, messages, emails, and attachments concerning Maneiro's complaint and the investigation of the aforementioned complaint.

To help limit the extent of the responsive documents, please limit search from Jan 1, 2018 through the time this request is processed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. I am an independent journalist and any records found will be used in the course of reporting about FEMA in Puerto Rico.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Carlos Berríos Polanco

title: WEST LA VA (U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please include all correspondence and communication relating to Jessica Miles and/or Sennett Devermont and/or Mrcheckpoint from 2023 - 2024 May 1. Please include VA police departments and administration at the West Los Angeles VA.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

sennett

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please share any communications and correspondence of beverly hills public servants, officers and officials that mention the following possible keywords in 2023 and 2024 from January to May 1. 

Sennett Devermont
Mr. Checkpoint
AFTP
@mrcheckpoint_
@mrcheckpoint_
mrcheckpoint
always film the police
always for the people
Ben Crump
Brad Gage
$500,000,000
500 million dollars 
racial profiling
class action lawsuit
Erewhon

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

sennett
